tasks.title: Project Setup and Chrome Extension Foundation
tasks.description: Set up the basic Chrome extension structure with Manifest V3, TypeScript, and React for the LearnSphere project.
tasks.details:
Create the foundational Chrome extension structure including:
- Manifest V3 configuration
- TypeScript setup with proper configuration
- React integration for UI components
- Basic folder structure (src/, public/, etc.)
- Development environment setup with hot reloading
- Basic extension popup and content script structure
tasks.testStrategy: Verify extension loads in Chrome, popup opens, and content scripts can be injected into PDF pages.

tasks.title: PDF Viewer Integration and Override
tasks.description: Integrate with Chrome's PDF viewer to override default behavior and inject LearnSphere functionality.
tasks.details:
Implement PDF viewer integration:
- Override Chrome's default PDF viewer for both web URLs and local files
- Integrate PDF.js for accurate rendering and layout preservation
- Ensure multimodal elements (diagrams, charts, equations) are properly rendered
- Set up content script injection into PDF pages
- Handle both online and offline PDF access
tasks.testStrategy: Test with various PDF types (text-heavy, image-heavy, mixed content) and verify proper rendering and script injection.

tasks.title: Document Processing and RAG Indexing
tasks.description: Implement document processing pipeline for PDF content extraction and RAG indexing using Vertex AI.
tasks.details:
Build document processing system:
- Extract text content from PDF pages
- Implement OCR for scanned documents if necessary
- Extract multimodal elements (images, diagrams, charts)
- Create embeddings using Vertex AI Vector Search
- Index content for efficient retrieval
- Implement document metadata storage
tasks.testStrategy: Process various PDF types and verify accurate content extraction and indexing.

tasks.title: Text Selection and Highlighting Interface
tasks.description: Implement text selection and highlighting functionality for user interaction with PDF content.
tasks.details:
Create text selection interface:
- Enable text highlighting on PDF pages
- Implement selection event handling
- Create visual feedback for selected text
- Store selection coordinates and content
- Handle multi-page selections
- Ensure compatibility with PDF.js rendering
tasks.testStrategy: Test text selection across different PDF layouts and verify accurate content capture.

tasks.title: Contextual Chat Sidebar UI
tasks.description: Design and implement the chat sidebar interface for LearnSphere interactions.
tasks.details:
Build chat sidebar component:
- Create collapsible sidebar UI
- Implement chat message interface
- Add input field for user questions
- Display conversation history
- Show selected content context
- Implement loading states and error handling
- Ensure responsive design for different screen sizes
tasks.testStrategy: Test sidebar functionality, chat interface, and responsive behavior across different devices.

tasks.title: AI Integration with Gemini API
tasks.description: Integrate Google Gemini API for AI-powered responses with strict RAG implementation.
tasks.details:
Implement AI integration:
- Set up Vertex AI client for Gemini access
- Implement strict RAG to constrain responses to PDF content only
- Create prompt engineering for accurate, grounded responses
- Handle API rate limiting and error cases
- Implement streaming responses for better UX
- Add authentication for API access
- Ensure secure data transmission
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI responses with various PDF content and verify strict adherence to source material.

tasks.title: Study Aid Generation - Summaries
tasks.description: Implement summary generation functionality for different scopes (page, chapter, document).
tasks.details:
Build summary generation:
- Implement scope selection (Current Page, Selected Chapter, Entire Document)
- Generate brief and detailed summary options
- Use Gemini API for content analysis
- Ensure summaries are grounded in PDF content
- Add export functionality for summaries
- Implement progress indicators during generation
tasks.testStrategy: Generate summaries for various PDF types and verify accuracy and relevance.

tasks.title: Study Aid Generation - Multiple Choice Quizzes
tasks.description: Implement MCQ generation with challenging questions and plausible distractors.
tasks.details:
Create quiz generation system:
- Generate multiple choice questions from PDF content
- Create plausible distractors using AI
- Implement quiz interface with scoring
- Add immediate feedback for answers
- Track quiz results locally
- Support different difficulty levels
- Ensure questions are grounded in source material
tasks.testStrategy: Generate quizzes for various topics and verify question quality and answer accuracy.

tasks.title: Local Database Implementation with IndexedDB
tasks.description: Implement local database using IndexedDB for storing learning analytics and user data.
tasks.details:
Set up local database:
- Implement IndexedDB using Dexie.js wrapper
- Design database schema for learning analytics
- Store quiz results, scores, and missed questions
- Track contextual chat query topics
- Implement data persistence and retrieval
- Add database migration capabilities
- Ensure data integrity and error handling
tasks.testStrategy: Test database operations, data persistence, and performance with various data loads.

tasks.title: Local Knowledge Gap Analysis
tasks.description: Implement client-side analysis to identify user knowledge gaps and learning patterns.
tasks.details:
Build knowledge gap analysis:
- Analyze quiz performance data locally
- Identify consistently missed topics/keywords
- Track learning progress over time
- Generate personalized insights
- Create topic difficulty assessments
- Implement learning pattern recognition
- Ensure privacy by keeping analysis local
tasks.testStrategy: Test analysis accuracy with sample data and verify privacy compliance.

tasks.title: Personalized Dashboard UI
tasks.description: Create a dashboard for users to view learning statistics and identified knowledge gaps.
tasks.details:
Design and implement dashboard:
- Create dashboard layout and navigation
- Display learning statistics and progress
- Show identified knowledge gaps
- Implement data visualization components
- Add export functionality for learning data
- Ensure responsive design
- Integrate with local database for real-time data
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard functionality, data display accuracy, and responsive behavior.

tasks.title: Customized Revision Plan Generation
tasks.description: Implement system to generate proactive revision suggestions based on knowledge gap analysis.
tasks.details:
Build revision planning system:
- Generate targeted revision suggestions
- Link suggestions to specific PDF sections
- Create personalized study recommendations
- Implement revision plan tracking
- Add progress monitoring for revision activities
- Ensure suggestions are actionable and specific
- Integrate with quiz system for targeted practice
tasks.testStrategy: Test revision plan generation and verify effectiveness in improving learning outcomes.

tasks.title: Extension Configuration and Settings
tasks.description: Implement user settings and configuration options for the LearnSphere extension.
tasks.details:
Create settings interface:
- Add extension popup with settings
- Implement user preferences storage
- Add configuration for AI model selection
- Create privacy and data management options
- Add export/import functionality for user data
- Implement theme and UI customization
- Add help and documentation access
tasks.testStrategy: Test settings persistence, configuration options, and user preference management.

tasks.title: Error Handling and User Feedback
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling and user feedback mechanisms throughout the extension.
tasks.details:
Build error handling system:
- Implement graceful error handling for API failures
- Add user-friendly error messages
- Create loading states and progress indicators
- Implement retry mechanisms for failed operations
- Add offline mode handling
- Create error logging and reporting
- Ensure consistent error messaging across features
tasks.testStrategy: Test error scenarios, user feedback, and recovery mechanisms.

tasks.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive testing suite for all LearnSphere functionality.
tasks.details:
Create testing framework:
- Implement unit tests for core functionality
- Add integration tests for AI interactions
- Create end-to-end tests for user workflows
- Test with various PDF types and content
- Implement performance testing
- Add accessibility testing
- Create automated testing pipeline
tasks.testStrategy: Run comprehensive test suite and verify all functionality works as expected.
